entities.description: Questions related to the adult respondents about their experience with depression.
The time frame referenced in the survey relating to the past 30 days.
Period lasting several days or longer when felt sad, empty, or depressed.
Period lasting several days or longer when felt very discouraged about life.
Period lasting several days or longer when lost interest in most things usually enjoyed.
Feeling discouraged about life when sad, empty, or depressed.
Respondent's answer to the question, typically 'Yes' or 'No'.
Response type indicating respondent legitimately skipped the question.
Response type indicating an invalid answer like 'DONT KNOW', 'REFUSED', or 'BLANK (NO ANSWER)'.

relationships.description: Relates the survey to the section about adult depression questions.
Indicates that the survey includes questions referencing the past 30 days.
Indicates if the respondent had a period of several days or longer when they felt sad, empty, or depressed.
Indicates if the respondent had a period of several days or longer when they felt very discouraged about life.
Indicates if the respondent had a period of several days or longer when they lost interest in most things they usually enjoy.
Defines if during the severe sadness period, the respondent felt discouraged about life.
Indicates the respondent's yes or no answer to various survey questions.
Indicates the respondent's legitimate skip answer to various survey questions.
Indicates the respondent's invalid answer to various survey questions, such as 'DONT KNOW', 'REFUSED', or 'BLANK (NO ANSWER)'.
